original: @274a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @274a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: badzra mah'a k'a la aashta ka sto tra /
analyzed: badzra mah'a k'a la aashta ka sto tra /
translated: Vajramahākālaṣṭakastotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: rdo rje nag po chen po'i bstod pa brgyad pa /
analyzed: rdo rje nag po chen po'i bstod pa brgyad pa /
translated: The Eight-Line Praise of Vajra Mahākāla

original: aom nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: aom nag po chen po la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Oṃ. Homage to Mahākāla!

original: h'a h'a h'um mdzad ki li ki li sgrogs pa'i sgra yis 'byung po'i tshogs pa rnam par 'thag / h'um h'um sgrogs pa'i zhal rnams kyis ni mi yi sha za rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'khrug pa'i sku //
analyzed: h'a h'a h'um mdzad ki li ki li sgrogs pa'i sgra yis 'byung po'i tshogs pa rnam par 'thag / h'um h'um sgrogs pa'i zhal rnams kyis ni mi yi sha za rgyu ma'i phreng ba 'khrug pa'i sku //
translated: With the sound of ha ha and hum hum resounding, the assembly of bhūtas is completely incinerated. With the sound of hum hum resounding, the faces consume human flesh, and the garland of intestines is agitated.

original: phyag na kha tv'am ga dang mdung thung mi yi lag pa'i mtshan pa 'dzin cing mdzes pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: phyag na kha tv'am ga dang mdung thung mi yi lag pa'i mtshan pa 'dzin cing mdzes pa'i gzugs //
translated: In his hands he holds a khaṭvāṅga and a spear, marked with a human hand, and he has a beautiful form.

original: mi sdug gzugs can spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser dur @274b khrod la dgyes zhing skyong kun nas srungs //
analyzed: mi sdug gzugs can spyan dang dbu skra dmar ser dur @274b khrod la dgyes zhing skyong kun nas srungs //
translated: With an ugly form, red-orange eyes and hair, he delights in the charnel ground and protects all.

original: zhal dang zhal nas phem phem phat ces sgrogs pas so sor bskyed pa'i me dpung chen po yi //
analyzed: zhal dang zhal nas phem phem phat ces sgrogs pas so sor bskyed pa'i me dpung chen po yi //
translated: From face to face, with the sound of pheṃ pheṃ and phaṭ phaṭ, he generates a great bonfire.

original: phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs shing sku la brgyan pas yan lag nye bar mdzes //
analyzed: phreng ba rab tu 'bar ba'i dbus na bzhugs shing sku la brgyan pas yan lag nye bar mdzes //
translated: He sits in the middle of a blazing garland, his body adorned, his limbs well-formed.

original: gsod byed drag po'i phyag gis mi yi khrag 'dzag rgyun du btung zhing sbrul gyi phreng bas brgyan //
analyzed: gsod byed drag po'i phyag gis mi yi khrag 'dzag rgyun du btung zhing sbrul gyi phreng bas brgyan //
translated: With his fierce, murderous hand, he drinks the flowing blood of men, and is adorned with a garland of snakes.

original: dmyal bar bsreg pa sel zhing sa steng zhing rnams skyong ba khyod ni rol zhing rol bar mdzod //
analyzed: dmyal bar bsreg pa sel zhing sa steng zhing rnams skyong ba khyod ni rol zhing rol bar mdzod //
translated: He dispels the burning of hell, and protects the fields on earth. You should play and enjoy yourself.

original: dri med rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes kyang srid pa gsum po khengs par 'gengs nus 'o dod kyis //
analyzed: dri med rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes kyang srid pa gsum po khengs par 'gengs nus 'o dod kyis //
translated: Though attaining stainless, perfect enlightenment, you are able to fill the three existences with cries of Oh!

original: h'um h'um phat ces ma rungs dgra yis nyin bzhin 'jig rten phyugs rnams kyi ni bgegs 'joms shing //
analyzed: h'um h'um phat ces ma rungs dgra yis nyin bzhin 'jig rten phyugs rnams kyi ni bgegs 'joms shing //
translated: With Hum hum phat, you destroy the evil enemies' obstructions to the world's cattle every day.

original: h'a h'a aanta dgod pa yis ni dus rnams kun du shin tu rab tu 'jigs par byed //
analyzed: h'a h'a aanta dgod pa yis ni dus rnams kun du shin tu rab tu 'jigs par byed //
translated: With Ha ha anta, you frighten extremely well and thoroughly at all times.

original: mgo skyes ral pa sma ra shin tu dmar ser nye bar 'phro ba'i zhing skyong srung bar mdzod //
analyzed: mgo skyes ral pa sma ra shin tu dmar ser nye bar 'phro ba'i zhing skyong srung bar mdzod //
translated: Protect the fields with your reddish-yellow hair, beard, and spreading flames.

original: sgeg cing rol pa'i 'jo sgeg dang ldan gsus pa 'phyang ba phyag na ral gri kham kham kham //
analyzed: sgeg cing rol pa'i 'jo sgeg dang ldan gsus pa 'phyang ba phyag na ral gri kham kham kham //
translated: With a graceful, playful, charming gait, with a protruding belly, with a sword in his hand, kham kham kham!

original: rakta 'thungs ba'i spyan dang phyag ni khrag ltar dmar ba ram ram ti dang ru ru ru //
analyzed: rakta 'thungs ba'i spyan dang phyag ni khrag ltar dmar ba ram ram ti dang ru ru ru //
translated: With eyes and hands red like blood, drinking blood, ram ram ti and ru ru ru!

original: ngo mtshar snang mdzad gtum po'i shugs can khro bo'i lta bas khro gnyer mdzod cig krum krum krum //
analyzed: ngo mtshar snang mdzad gtum po'i shugs can khro bo'i lta bas khro gnyer mdzod cig krum krum krum //
translated: With a wrathful gaze, the wrathful one, the wondrous Acala, the powerful one, frown, khrum khrum khrum!

original: 'khor bcas skyong ba'i zhing skyong ma lus bdud dang ro langs 'dul bar mdzad pa tam tam tam //
analyzed: 'khor bcas skyong ba'i zhing skyong ma lus bdud dang ro langs 'dul bar mdzad pa tam tam tam //
translated: The protector of the field, the protector of the retinue, the subduer of all demons and zombies, tam tam tam!

original: nges par gnod pa'i bdud dang nyon mongs bag chags gcod byed gri gug 'dzin pa hrim hrim hrim //
analyzed: nges par gnod pa'i bdud dang nyon mongs bag chags gcod byed gri gug 'dzin pa hrim hrim hrim //
translated: The one who severs the fetters of the demons of harm and the afflictions, the one who holds a flaying knife, hrim hrim hrim!

original: nag po'i mchu dang 'dra ba'i sku ni rtsod dang nyes 'phrog thod pa'i phreng can kam kam kam //
analyzed: nag po'i mchu dang 'dra ba'i sku ni rtsod dang nyes 'phrog thod pa'i phreng can kam kam kam //
translated: With a body like the beak of a crow, the one with a garland of skulls, the one who takes away faults and disputes, kam kam kam!

original: rmad byung 'od kyis 'jig rten g-yo zhing snang bar mdzad pa gtum po'i shugs can tsam tsam tsam //
analyzed: rmad byung 'od kyis 'jig rten g-yo zhing snang bar mdzad pa gtum po'i shugs can tsam tsam tsam //
translated: The wondrous light, the one who moves and illuminates the world, the powerful one, tsam tsam tsam!

original: lha mchog dam tshig ldan pa khyod kyis tshogs kyi mchog dang zhing rnams skyongs shig sam sam sam //
analyzed: lha mchog dam tshig ldan pa khyod kyis tshogs kyi mchog dang zhing rnams skyongs shig sam sam sam //
translated: You, O Supreme God, who are endowed with the vow, protect the supreme assembly and the fields, sam sam sam.

original: 'gro ba sna tshogs dri med chu bzhin gzigs nas nges par gshin rje 'gog byed yam yam yam //
analyzed: 'gro ba sna tshogs dri med chu bzhin gzigs nas nges par gshin rje 'gog byed yam yam yam //
translated: Having seen the various beings like a stainless river, you will certainly stop Yama, yam yam yam.

original: rlung gi shugs bzhin myur du rgyu bas nyon mongs 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa bam bam bam //
analyzed: rlung gi shugs bzhin myur du rgyu bas nyon mongs 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa bam bam bam //
translated: Like the speed of the wind, you move quickly, illuminating the world of afflictions, vam vam vam.

original: smin ma gya gyu'i khro gnyer bsnyer bas 'jigs par mdzad kyang 'jigs las thar byed bhrum bhrum bhrum //
analyzed: smin ma gya gyu'i khro gnyer bsnyer bas 'jigs par mdzad kyang 'jigs las thar byed bhrum bhrum bhrum //
translated: Although you frighten with the knitted eyebrows of wrathfulness, you liberate from fear, bhruṃ bhruṃ bhruṃ.

original: sgrub po rnams la phan dang bde mdzad gnod pa'i sgo rnams bsrung ba'i zhing skyong ksham ksham ksham //
analyzed: sgrub po rnams la phan dang bde mdzad gnod pa'i sgo rnams bsrung ba'i zhing skyong ksham ksham ksham //
translated: You, the field protector who guards the doors of harm, bring benefit and happiness to the adepts, kṣam kṣam kṣam.

original: bzod pa'i lus can kshim kshim kshim zhes gdug pa rnams kyis bzod @275a * //
analyzed: bzod pa'i lus can kshim kshim kshim zhes gdug pa rnams kyis bzod @275a * //
translated: You, whose body is forbearance, kṣiṃ kṣiṃ kṣiṃ, make an uproar difficult to bear for the wicked,

original: par dka' ba'i ca co sgrog / ka ha ka ha'i gsung gi rgyun dang char sprin sngon po'i lus can gcig bus thams cad gnon //
analyzed: par dka' ba'i ca co sgrog / ka ha ka ha'i gsung gi rgyun dang char sprin sngon po'i lus can gcig bus thams cad gnon //
translated: with the stream of speech 'ka ha ka ha' and the body of a single blue rain cloud, you suppress everything.

original: hr'im kl'im shr'im gis sngags dang pa tsa pa tsa'i sngags rnams kyis ni lus can thal bar byed //
analyzed: hr'im kl'im shr'im gis sngags dang pa tsa pa tsa'i sngags rnams kyis ni lus can thal bar byed //
translated: With the mantras HRIH KLIM SHRIM, and with the mantras PACA PACA, you reduce embodied beings to ashes.

original: sgrub po rnams la kun du gcod pa'i gegs rnams nye bar zhi bar mdzod cig zhing skyong che //
analyzed: sgrub po rnams la kun du gcod pa'i gegs rnams nye bar zhi bar mdzod cig zhing skyong che //
translated: You are the great protector of the fields, pacifying all obstacles for the adepts.

original: klam klam klam zhes rtag tu nyon mongs gyur pa'i lus can srid gsum 'gro ba'i nyon mongs rnams //
analyzed: klam klam klam zhes rtag tu nyon mongs gyur pa'i lus can srid gsum 'gro ba'i nyon mongs rnams //
translated: With the sound KLIM KLIM KLIM, you always remove the afflictions of embodied beings in the three worlds.

original: rnam par bsal nas phyag gi zhags pas skyong zhing srung ba la phan phyugs bdag pam pam pam //
analyzed: rnam par bsal nas phyag gi zhags pas skyong zhing srung ba la phan phyugs bdag pam pam pam //
translated: Having removed them, you protect and guard with the noose in your hand.🔽You are the lord of cattle, PAM PAM PAM. You are the lord of mantras, with a body of mantras, intoxicated with mantras, bestowing the bliss of peace through mantras, with the fruit of homage.

original: sngags kyi bdag nyid sngags kyi sku can sngags myos sngags kyis zhi ba'i bde ster 'bras bu'i phyag / mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku bzhin mdzes pa zhing rnams skyong bar mdzad pa khyod kyis de rnams srungs //
analyzed: sngags kyi bdag nyid sngags kyi sku can sngags myos sngags kyis zhi ba'i bde ster 'bras bu'i phyag / mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku bzhin mdzes pa zhing rnams skyong bar mdzad pa khyod kyis de rnams srungs //
translated: You protect those who are beautiful like the body of all the Victorious Ones, you who protect the fields.

original: sgrub pa po'am slob dpon gang zhig dam tshig dge mchog mkhas pa'i blo can thun gsum du //
analyzed: sgrub pa po'am slob dpon gang zhig dam tshig dge mchog mkhas pa'i blo can thun gsum du //
translated: You who are the adept or master, with the mind of the supreme virtue of the commitments, in the three periods of the day,

original: sngags kyi bstod pa brgyad po klog byed de rnams bsod nams ldan zhing rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang // tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byor ldan mnyam med stobs kyis rnam par gnon pa'i gzi brjid rgyas //
analyzed: sngags kyi bstod pa brgyad po klog byed de rnams bsod nams ldan zhing rgyal bar 'gyur ba dang // tshe dang dpal dang grags dang 'byor ldan mnyam med stobs kyis rnam par gnon pa'i gzi brjid rgyas //
translated: endowed with life, glory, fame, and wealth, and will be filled with the splendor of the power of subduing all.

original: thams cad shes shing de yis nyin mtshan rtag tu bgegs kyi tshogs ni myos shing nyams par 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad shes shing de yis nyin mtshan rtag tu bgegs kyi tshogs ni myos shing nyams par 'gyur //
translated: He will know all things, and by that, the hosts of obstacles will always be stupefied and destroyed day and night.

original: rdo rje nag po chen po'i bstod pa brgyad pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o//
analyzed: rdo rje nag po chen po'i bstod pa brgyad pa slob dpon chen po klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas mdzad pa'o//
translated: The eight praises of Vajra Mahākāla were composed by the great master Nāgārjuna.
